about_the_game:
This DLC gives you access to Season 3 Episode 8: Divinity War! Peter strikes a deal with a certain banned God while his friends deal with the monster terrorizing Hella City.



... Of Losers, Cool Kids and Gods, Peter is left in the aftermath of the twins' divine fight. Mini's evil ex has stolen her wings, taken over the school, and banished Cody to the void. And as if it couldn't get any worse, Peter's tasked himself with flying to him! Though ascension proves difficult, there may be hope yet: Why fly, when you can sink?



Cool Kid Cody is an interactive point & click cartoon series!

Interact with the world using point & click mechanics!
Collect items, make choices and explore in order to progress the story!
Find bonus photos scattered across each episode!
And find game development sketches in trash cans!
Keep your ride powered up by making the coolest choice for the coolest scenes!
3 seasons worth of story, 30 episodes total!

The first 3 episodes of each season are free with the rest unlockable as DLC!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
